sentences.text: // Module functions may have been  defined earlier by hand.
The following revision refers to this bug:
is this something you're working on Rafael?
Is it a P1 to have  this test disabled (eg, do we have other tests covering this API)?
Mads, can you make sense of the stack trace in comment 0?
Ivan, in isolation I can't make sense of the stack trace.
bind uses apply with  arguments for which we have an optimization in V8, but without more information I have  no idea if this is related to that.
(No comment was entered for this change.)
I don't think anyone else is going to pick this up if it's unassigned, so back to the  author of the test.
(No comment was entered for this change.)
(No comment was entered for this change.)
(No comment was entered for this change.)
So is this a crash in the test or a JS exception?
If it's the latter, we should re- enable as FLAKY_ and see if we can still repro.
If the former, please add the Crash  label and see if you can repro locally.
(No comment was entered for this change.)

Issue 44086  has been merged into this issue.
This is happening on more test cases in that suite (see  issue 44086  ).
I think the  whole suite is susceptible to this crash.
We might have to just disable the whole thing  if we can't figure out the crasher.
